title: D.O.C.
description: D.O.C, for Department of Cartoons, is my archive of past artworks and model sheets from 2005 to 2009. The name derives from [Cartoon Network's D.O.C](https://web.archive.org/web/19991012063030/http://cartoonnetwork.com:80/doc/index.html), which served the same purpose but focused on concept art instead of general artwork.

items.title: 3k Views
items.description: Fall was starting at the time I had gotten 3k views. Meanwhile, somebody asked if Zack was naked in this drawing. I said "yes" and everyone freaked out. xD

items.title: 4k Views
items.description: My views in DeviantART kept going up.

items.title: At the Beach
items.description: I wrote a complete story behind this picture that I completely forgot. He had an eye patch because I wasn't good at drawing eyes, at the time.

items.title: Beach time
items.description: Voices of Summer is a DJ Mix by DJ GT & Project C that I listened to a lot back then. Both this and At the Beach were drawn during the summer.

items.title: Fried Brain
items.description: I had recently started school at this point and I was getting burnt quite frequently. xD

items.title: Is it Christmas Yet?
items.description: This was originally a flash that I turned into a wallpaper because I loved it so much.

items.title: Me as a Fox
items.description: The first version of what would later become Zack. I forgot why I gave him gloves.

items.title: Megawolf
items.description: A gift for Megawolf because I loved his artwork. I don't think we had becomes friends at this point. Done entirely in paint.

items.title: Mega
items.description: At this point, Megawolf and I were friends and I started referring to him as "Mega".

items.title: Mom & Dad
items.description: For a short time, Zack was a cat-fox hybrid because the way I drew him resembled more of a cat even though he had a fox-like tail.

items.title: Cookie Girl
items.description: Take Angelica from Rugrats and increase her cookie obsession up to 11.

items.title: 4th of July
items.description: The idea originated from Coshi Dragonite's [We salute to Red White Blue](https://www.deviantart.com/coshi-dragonite/art/We-salute-to-Red-White-Blue-20135862) and it turned into it a tradition for a while. XD

items.title: Alex
items.description: A furry version of my younger half-brother who is much older now. I never really got to evolve his character because we moved.

items.title: Coding
items.description: While not the only reason, it did contribute to me getting out of web development until [Blazor: WebAssembly](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/apps/aspnet/web-apps/blazor).

items.title: Cirria
items.description: A furry version of a cat I use to have.

items.title: Oh no!
items.description: I think when I drew this it was intended to be something else but because of my clunky art style, at the time, it looked like he was about to fall.

items.title: FBDJ Website
items.description: Made in Microsoft Frontpage, The Furry Blue DJ was meant to showcase my artwork. Though a version of FBDJ did eventually exist under a .com, it mostly wind up serving as a portal that linked to other subdomains within in it because a personal gallery to the equivalent of this was not possible with my limited resources and knowledge on web development.

items.title: Amtrak's P40 locomotive
items.description: I wanted to draw something not furry for once and get into my love of trains. So I painstakingly drew this with a mouse.

items.title: FBDJ v2 Website
items.description: Version 2 of Furry Blue DJ website continued with the idea of showcasing my art but with broader dreams of making it more like my own personal DeviantART. The homepage reflected that but it was all updated manually.

items.title: Plant your Butt
items.description: I was silly. xD

items.title: Furry Blue DOC
items.description: Before merging into this site, Furry Blue DOC was spin off to the [Furry Blue DJ](/gallery/doc/4124198d-5289-4a24-aa06-49f1e4d3204d) created when I actually did have a site called that. It eventually became the spiritual successor, existing on many static websites, after I removed all the PHP components and rebuilt in Dreamweaver.

items.title: Zack and the Big Bubble
items.description: I had intended to submit that on DeviantART way back when but wanted to redo the bubble. Unfortunately, I kept forgetting about it.

items.title: Don't Adjust Your Eyes
items.description: He adjusted his eyes. xD

items.title: Sonic
items.description: Somehow I drew this paint.

items.title: A Pup that Loves to Fly
The Good, The Bad, The Z
iCrazy
items.description: I was really into the iPod, at the time.

items.title: Good Morning, World
items.description: I wanted to test out out shading.

items.title: Zack vs Bunni
items.description: Unfortunately, I forgot who created Bunni.

items.title: Get Something Done
items.description: I might remake this.

items.title: Windows XP: Insane Edition
items.description: I think this was featured somewhere on DeviantART, and it got me popular for a bit.

items.title: Zack Rattus Casey
items.description: Pre-Aidan, experimenting with Zack as a Rat.

items.title: Brain Dead
items.description: And an early attempt at a neck.

items.title: A Chibi
items.description: Well, to the best of my ability at the time. xD
